original_text: And next to him shall be the tribe of Manasseh, the chief of the people of Manasseh being Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur,
korean_text: 그 곁에는 므낫세 지파가 있을 것이라 므낫세 자손의 지휘관은 브다술의 아들 가말리엘이요

sentences.original_text: And next to him shall be the tribe of Manasseh
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 옆에는 므낫세 지파가 있을 것이며

sentences.original_text: the chief of the people of Manasseh
being Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur,
